snippet.title: "What is a game?" | Official Trailer | by White Box
snippet.description:
Museum.exe - The Virtual Museum about Game Design

 A virtual museum about games that have contributed to the field of game design without relying on combat, competition and violence. Games that changed the field of video games, and will be forever looked upon by generations of both players and designers alike. 

Check it out on Itch: (link in comments)
#museum #gamedesign #exhibition #itchio
